actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill relating to the administration of manpower training programs for persons whose primary language is not English.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to use his authority under this Act, the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964, and the Emergency Employment Act of 1971, to enter into a contract or other arrangement with a private organization under which it will administer Federal programs designed to provide manpower training for persons whose primary language is not English.

titles.title: A bill relating to the administration of manpower training programs for persons whose primary language is not English.
